column1:
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_2;Choose what action you would like to perform.
 State of character:
 Max hit points: [Root.duel_max_hp.GetValue] Hit points left: [Root.duel_hp.GetValue] 
 Attack Energy: [Root.duel_att.GetValue] Defend Energy: [Root.duel_def.GetValue]
 Special Attacks: [Root.sp_ac.GetValue];;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_100;The sound of clashing steel rings through the air!\n Damage dealt: [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue]\n Damage recieved: [From.duel_dmg.GetValue];;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_101;The sound of clashing steel rings through the air!\n Damage dealt: [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue]\n Damage recieved: [From.duel_dmg.GetValue];;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_102;You exchanged the blows with your enemy
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_103;You exchanged the blows with your enemy
EVTDESC_DUELACTION_200;Your enemy launches a depsperate attack. Too weak to parry their blow
column2: you feel the steel of their blade slice you open
column3: recieving [From.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage. Warm blood stains your clothing and you fall to the ground
column4: the life draining from your body. Hearing your enemy's roar of triumph
column5: you give in to the icy grip of death
column6: contemplating the mistakes you have made.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_DUELACTION_201;As you press your advantage upon your enemy
column2: you can feel your blows sapping their strength. Launching your final attack
column3: you deal them [Root.duel_dmg.GetValue] damage and cut through their armor
column4: severing their torso in two. Letting out a ferocuious bellow
column5: you sginal your victory to the onlookers and challenge another to take the place of your opponent. None step forward.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: EVTDESC_DUELACTION_202;You managed to escape from certain death at the hands of your enemy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
EVTOPTA_DUELACTION_202;I must get away from here!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ACTION_WIZARD_ATTACK_CANTRIP-ATTACK_TOOLTIP; This spell has a cast value of 10, and does damage based on your caster level. This spell takes part in the attack phase of your action in the duel;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ACTION_WIZARD_DEFEND_CANTRIP-COUNTER_TOOLTIP;This Spell has a cast value of 10. It causes you to counter any enemy attack with a bonus defense value of your caster level+10, making you almost immune to damage;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

ACTION_WIZARD_STONE-SKIN_CANTRIP-BUFF_TOOLTIP;This Spell causes you to gain a stacking damage resistance effect of a value determined by your caster level for a duration determined by your caster level.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
